text:

Any time I hear the theme to Cinema Paradiso…I fight back tears. Such an amazing (Italian) movie.

@davidmackau Objected to Dead Poets' Society's depiction of teaching.  Ken Barlow does teachers no favours either. Half-Nelson was fair.

Also a cinema projectionist and neither Cinema Paradiso nor The Smallest Show on Earth, delightful though they were, could be accused of accuracy.

Check out this new canvas print that I uploaded to https://t.co/f1IowKhpIZ! https://t.co/h5STTYz2B0 Inspired by film Cinema Paradiso in which the town's priest would ring a bell if he found kissing in a film for scene to be cut since kisses in his view would be carnal excess.
